title: Impact of Honouring Sri Krishna Prasadam | @madhupanditdasaofficial
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Maharaj

segments.text: we distribute food that is sanctified it's not about even material purity when it becomes
sanctified by offering to the lord with gratitude to the lord for providing this for existence
that makes it super sanctified spiritually sanctified it has got a very curative healing
transcendental effect for the good of the person who honors sanctified food and that is what we
are distributing and how is it sanctified the lord sanctifies it transcendentally he sees the
the lord eats our it's a mystical process every lot is not offered the lord knows thousands of
people are coming every day mass distribution of prasadam means you know it's a different kind of
you know leela of the lord you see just like shaktivesha nama lord shakti enters in it
similarly food is when it is offered to the lord it is spiritualized food it is matter
